Title: Dirty Little Secrets
Plot: Harvey and Jessica's relationship is tested when Harvey defends someone from her past. Also, Louis assigns Mike his first solo case, a pro bono that has him itching for a win.
ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
GuestStars: Russell Hornsby, Sharon Leal, Anthony Starke, Matthew Lemche, Paulino Nunes, Donald Burda, Christina Chang
